GP12agp_bi_u:33770: yair idaṃ vāsavaṃ naktaṃ vartate kramaśaḥ sadā //AP_*5.009cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33772: savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃś ca mahāmata //AP_*5.010cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33783: yasmin gate dinakare tamasā pūryate jagat /AP_*5.016ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33803: tantu deśaṃ gatau deśāt vicarantau yadṛcchayā //AP_*5.025cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33804: tābhyāṃ tatra tadākṛṣṭā urvaśī tu varāpsarāḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:33816: dṛṣṭvā tanvyāstu tadrūpaṃ tau devau viṣayaṃgatau
GP12agp_bi_u:33817: tasyā hāsyena lāsyena smitena lalitena ca /AP_*5.032ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33821: susvareṇa hi gītena urvaśyā madhureṇa ca /AP_*5.033cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33824: retastrabhāgaṃ kamaleca vantau vasiṣṭha sevantu pitāmahojaṃ(3)
GP12agp_bi_u:33825: tattridhā patitaṃ retaḥ kamale 'tha sthale jale /AP_*5.035ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33827: sthale tvagastyaḥ sambhūto jale matsyo mahādyutiḥ //AP_*5.035ef/
GP12agp_bi_u:33841: evaṃ te kathitaṃ vipra vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ //AP_*5.040cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33847: yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ havyakavye dvijottama //AP_*5.043cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33848: devāś ca pitarastasya tṛptā yānti yathāsukhaṃ /AP_*5.044ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33849: yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ prātarutthāya mānavaḥ //AP_*5.044cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33862: etadākhyāhi me sūta tvayaitat suciraṃ purā //AP_*6.001cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33879: tathā te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu vatsa samāhitaḥ //AP_*6.008cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33883: bhṛgoḥ khyātyāṃ mamutpanno mṛkaṇḍurnāma vai sutaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:33884: sumitrā nāma patrī ca mṛkaṇḍostu mahātmanaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:33886: tasyāṃ tasya suto jāto mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ //AP_*6.011cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33888: bubudhe vallabho vālaḥ pitā tatra kṛtakriyaḥ //AP_*6.012cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33889: tasmin vai jātamātre tu ādeśī kaścidabravīt /AP_*6.013ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33890: varṣe dvādaśame putro mṛtvyārtaś ca bhaviṣyati //AP_*6.013cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33893: tathāpi tat pitā dhīmān yatnāt kālakriyāṃ tataḥ /AP_*6.015ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33898: tasthau tatra gṛhe dhīmān mārkaṇḍeyo mahādyutiḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:33900: duḥkhitau tau bhṛśaṃ tatra tanmātṛpitarau śuka //AP_*6.018cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33908: vaktum arhasi duḥkhasya kāraṇaṃ mama pṛcchataḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:33910: kathayāmāsa tatsarvaṃ ādeśī yad uvāca ha //AP_*6.021cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33911: tac chrutvāsau suniścāha mātaraṃ pitaraṃ punaḥ /AP_*6.022ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33913: apaneṣyāmi mṛtyuṃ X tapasā nātra saṃśayaḥ /AP_*6.023ab/
GP12agp_bi_u:33914: yathā cāhaṃ cirāyuḥsthāṃ kuryāṃ tathā mahattapaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:33926: evaṃ matimahāvuddhe kiṃ tvaṃ karma cikīrṣasi //AP_*6.028ef/
GP12agp_bi_u:33935: ko jetuṃ śaknuyān mṛtyuṃ tatastaṃ tapasārcaya //AP_*6.030cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33938: bhaktapriyaṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ bhaktyā taṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GP12agp_bi_u:33945: tasmāt tvaṃ lokakartāraṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ śriyaḥpatiṃ
GP12agp_bi_u:33946: govindaṃ gopatiṃ devaṃ satataṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja //AP_*6.035cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33948: vatsa jetāsi mṛtyuṃ tvaṃ sasainyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GP12agp_bi_u:33953: ārādhitaś ca bhagavān mama mṛtyuṃ harediti //AP_*6.038cd/
GP12agp_bi_u:33957: tuṅgā ca bhaginī bhadrā dve nadyau mantrasambhave /AP_*6.040ab/
